name: FindingDory
description:
This game is for educational purposes only and was made in a college graphics class, simply intended as a fun project to demonstrate graphic concepts. If there are any copyright problems please message me and I will take it down as soon as I can.

References, sources, and more information about this project can be found on my teacher's page: http://users.csc.calpoly.edu/~zwood/teaching/csc476/final20/findingD/
